entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Inuvik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:26 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -33.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Inuvik Airport 07:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -33.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -47
Dewpoint: -36.7°C
Wind: ENE 20 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 30.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 50 this morning and minus 42 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 06:49 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022
